invariants.statement: Curvature λ is defined only relative to a μ-weighted δ-geometry.
invariants.formal: λ(B) is well-defined iff μ and δ layers are consistent for B.

invariants.statement: Curvature tensors satisfy a Bianchi-like identity compatible with δ.
invariants.formal: ∇\_δ λ obeys a cyclic identity (abstracted Bianchi).
